attributes.action: I voted for a common market - not a united states of europe.
attributes.additional_details: We are sick of the EU telling us what we can and can't do Mr Cameron.  £8 billion + to allow foreign supposed EU citizens and so-called asylum seekers to come here and get benefits is ridiculous.  We can't even deport unwanted 'scum'.  Get a grip if you want to remain in govenment, otherwise you will find that the BNP and parties with similar ideals will sneak up on you, something totally abhorrent.
